structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 20. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 3. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 12, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3138-1, 3138-2, 3140, 3235dd-35, 3351a-1, 3351a-2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Police and fire departments -- Control -- Salaries.
